website_summaries.verdict: An affordable double-height air mattress that's available in twin and queen sizes.
pros: Inflates quickly and easily using the built-in pump
Inflation level can be adjusted for your comfort
cons: Fine for occasional use but won't last long if you use it regularly

customer_reviews.title: Update on EZ Inflable mattress
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this inflatable bed so my daughter's friends have Something to sleep on for her sleepovers. We blew it up and it filled nice and fast. However it deflated completely within an hour. Blew it up again and deflated just as quickly. Very disappointed In this product especially Since the price was quite high. At least for it to stay inflated. Would love a refund. The company emailed me 2 days after I wrote this review and said they were sorry for the bad experience, and were sending me a new air mattress. The mattress came quickly and works great. Finally a company that stands behind their products and cares about their customers.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Edwardson

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress
customer_reviews.text: This mattress has been a life saver! Purchased to use for out of town guests. It arrived just in time for our Florida spring break company and we've used it non stop since. Everyone said it was very comfortable and the sheets didn't slide off! It is just as advertised - easy set up, inflates quickly and holds the air. Also love that it stores easily in our tiny condo. Overall, great product and great value.
customer_reviews.author: Dhaz

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Sturdy and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Came same day, very comfortable, very fast to fill up and also fast to deflate. Stayed full all through the night. Kitty even jumped on it a couple times and nothing bad happened. It’s made very well and sturdy. And the single size was a perfect size for one adult.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Extremely happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: The airbed came fast with Prime and was extremely easy to blow up. It is very comfortable and our guests said they enjoyed it and even asked where we got it! So far it has been used several nights for family from out of town and we got nothing but compliments on it. The bed seems very solid and has a nice top to it which was comfortable when I tried it out. We will be taking this to our camp this year as well so it should come in handy. If you are looking for a good alternative to the pricey ones definitely give it a try, the warranty made us comfortable as well.
customer_reviews.author: Bhavin Datt

customer_reviews.title: Beyond impressed!
customer_reviews.text: Ok so I rarely leave reviews. I ordered this mattress last minute because unexpected company was coming. I was beyond impressed. This is not your air mattress from a few years ago. Amazingly comfortable, really. My guests were shocked at the comfort. There ordering one for themselves. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jane Cohn

customer_reviews.title: Spontaneously ripped in April after being bought in February
customer_reviews.text: As I rolled over on mattress, attempting to get comfortable to sleep, the mattress spontaneously ripped along entire edge of one air cell (see pictures), and is now worthless after less than 3 months of ownership. I was flabbergasted. Moreover, Mayfair's failure to act promptly to resolve this issue has prompted this 1-star review. I have already written twice to the company—providing the attached photos, as well as other requested information—but have heard nothing further from Mayfair. Hopefully, this poor review will prompt Mayfair to action.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Moore

customer_reviews.title: It's a blow up bed let's see what happens to the next one before I give a final word on this brand
customer_reviews.text: I love that the bed was high enough that you could get out easy. However the second night the bed lost air. We added air three times and decided that was it and so my daughter had to sleep on the sofa the next night. At 2am in the morning I was so upset I called amonaz to let them know I was Very disappointed and felt bad for my daughter and my 3 year old gran son that at that time of night they were up and down adding air to a new bed. Amazon was kind enough to send a new one with help to buy a different brand if needed. Will give new up date ASAP
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: I recommend it, durable airbed
customer_reviews.text: EZ Inflate says it all, took less than 2 minutes to blow up. Bag it comes with is nice and I like the dual pump. The bed is comfortable and the price was just right. I had an expensive Coleman airbed years ago and this is far superior at half the price.
customer_reviews.author: T Sewrat

customer_reviews.title: Customer support is the best there is
customer_reviews.text: The first two of these mattresses I got leaked but their customer service and quality control sent me out another one that worked perfect. For camping you need an air mattress but doesn’t go flat
customer_reviews.author: Brad Hillhouse

customer_reviews.title: Used to stage a home for sale
customer_reviews.text: Loved this inflatable mattress with pump. Easy to operate both inflating and deflating. The motor is little loud but only lasts while using, just may not want to try this late at night if your neighbors are sensitive. I think it's a little louder than a vacuum cleaner. Not sure about comfort as this was used to stage a condo for sale. Worked like a charm! I also purchased the bedframe. In the photo, the mattress is on the frame, so it appears taller than it would be if used on floor alone.
customer_reviews.author: PJBLargo

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I received this mattress quick, and it came right on time! I had a surprise visit from some family members and was so impressed with this air mattress. The mattress inflates extremely fast, compared to other brands such as Intex. Also it appears to be made with a much sturdier material. My experience with air mattresses is that they expand through out the first use and need to be pumped again the remain firm, however this mattress stayed firm throughout the entire night. My family members said they had a good night on it and that it was extremely comfortable. I would 100% recommend this mattress to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amina

customer_reviews.title: Easy to inflate
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and held air for our guests. Took a mere minute or two to fully blow up. Rolled up nicely afterwards and fit in the bag, great for guests and I will note, we blew it up before our guests got here to let it stretch like the directions said and then topped it off prior to their arrival and had no issues. We will take it on our travels to come.
customer_reviews.author: David Gumienny

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Great the first two nights, then started with a slow leak. Not usable anymore as I cant find the leak but believe its around the pump casing. Kids 5 and 7 were only ones on it. Update: I never do this, but changing my two star review to 5 stars. The company saw my review and immediately sent me a new one no questions asked. They did not ask me to update my review like others have and informed me that if I have any future issues I have a 2 year warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Tennant

customer_reviews.title: Leaked After One Use
customer_reviews.text: Used it once and now it is leaking. After the first use, we deflated it per directions and stored it in the bag inside a plastic tub. Took it out 3 weeks later, inflated and slept on it. While it was not a fast leak, we were definitely sagging the next morning. The second time it was used was 2 days after the return date so we are stuck with it. We have no idea where the leak is so unsure where/how to repair. If we can't locate it to repair it, the garbage man will have it. I have slept on other brands and been comfortable. This one left much to be desired. Look for something else.
customer_reviews.author: LAMP

customer_reviews.title: Great until it would no longer hold air.
customer_reviews.text: Worked for 2 weeks, then something somewhere ruptured, now immediately deflates. Returned. Such a shame, I was so impressed before this. UPDATE the company contacted me, and sent me another for free. Hard to fault their customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Make sure u don't pop it
customer_reviews.text: So IDK if I'm the only 1 who has a slow leak in the mattress I blew it up for the first time left up for a couple hours Make sure the rug was vacuumed nothing sharp was touching it and nothing was around it but it has a slow leak didn't even get to use it :(
customer_reviews.author: DickNutSwagin

customer_reviews.title: Could have been better
customer_reviews.text: I have had other inflatable beds. This one seems very durable. Doesn’t appear to be as large as my previous queen inflatable but i did not measure and compare the two. Pros: Seems well made, firm bed Cons: -Inflate mechanisms is not user friendly in the middle of the night if you needed to add air, not a push button like previous mattress (Intex same price range) -cold, unlike my other mattress this one was cold all night and required a thick blanket to lay on, for some reason the air inside made it uncomfortably cold to lay on, had inflated for 2 days, in a normal temperature room before guests slept on it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert R

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful..used it during hotel stay
customer_reviews.text: I used it during a stay at hotel where we needed extra beds! Easy to inflate and so easy to deflate! I was able to pack in it my large suitcase but the carrier bag would have also been perfect. I live in a one bedroom apt. and it will be perfect for my guest, its roomy and comfortable. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Connie C

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: This blow up mattress is the BOMB!!! Don’t be a dummy and open the box with a knife like the bad picture you see in the reviews. The only reason they have ripped mattresses is cause they used a box cutter or something. ONLY USE YOUR HANDS to open it. Love this blow up mattress. Get it for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Stefania

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: So it seemed like a good option for a bed and Is big enough for 2 people. But the AIT pump is extremely loud and deflated the next morning. Edit to add: Company contacted me immediately and are sending out a new mattress immediately. So amazing customer service👌👌
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress!
customer_reviews.text: I've never had much luck with inflatable mattresses but just moved and needed one because I didn't have a bed. I have been sleeping on this mattress for six weeks now and absolutely love it! I only have to blow it up every couple of weeks, which is so unusual for inflatable mattresses. It is great value for your money, I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Joan C Manning

customer_reviews.title: Nice on the first use, no good after that.
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this air mattress BUT I’ve only used it three times since it’s been purchased two months ago and just deflates throughout the night.
customer_reviews.author: VIOLET GREY

customer_reviews.title: Good quality not big
customer_reviews.text: This bed is really good . It’s not big at all so it doesn’t take up space and it’s very comfortable. I have a son who sometimes try and jump on it and it hasn’t torn or anything like that so it’s durable and strong. This is one of the good ones because I have ordered multiple of different ones and they torn on me instantly so this is the best thus far . Also the cord is installed on the bed , so it’s easy to use perfect 👌 also three people can fit just fine
customer_reviews.author: Taija Gallimore

customer_reviews.title: Customer service is the best
customer_reviews.text: The mattress itself is very comfortable and super easy to set up and deflate to put away. But the best part of this mattress is the customer service! After using this mattress for some time and on a regular basis it started to lose some air, a slow leak? Anyway, after contacting customer service they were very helpful and replaced the mattress in a very timely manner. Great product and great customer service. So happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product.They will take  care of you if you have any problem with the product..
customer_reviews.text: The product is nice and comfortable.at first when I ordered it,the bed had problem with durability but when I reached out to customer service.they changed it and shipped it express for me.customers service is top notch.the current bed I have now is durable and better than the last one.
customer_reviews.author: Damian

customer_reviews.title: Major leakage
customer_reviews.text: The air mattress started leaking with the first inflate. First night I had to inflate again at 5am. Second night the mattress was inflated at 9pm, half empty by 2am. I got a bad one but will not replace with the same one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My favorite air mattress
customer_reviews.text: This air mattress is great! I love the way it inflated and deflated so easily. It is an air mattress, so comfort is probably never a 5 star...however it’s easily adjustable in softness because you can just deflate or inflate by turning a knob. Fully inflated would be good for firm mattress lovers and slightly deflated is good for cushy mattress lovers. I think this mattress is my favorite of all my air mattresses because it is tall. You don’t feel as if your so close to the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Amazing value and comfort, a bit noisy
customer_reviews.text: We've been extremely happy with this inflatable mattress. It really does inflate in 2 minutes, holds air for weeks at a time, and is incredibly comfortable, even as compared to our expensive air-chamber bed. The only complaint is that it can be a bit noisy for two sleepers -- when one gets up, the support beams inside the mattress tend to expand and create a fair amount of noise (ping-ping-ping). Temporary, but will likely wake a light sleeping partner.
customer_reviews.author: PEJ

customer_reviews.title: So disappointing. Amended!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this exactly 3 weeks and it won’t hold air. So disappointing! I am out of the return window by a few days. Do your self a favor, chose something else! I am 5’ 7” 134 pounds! The company replaced this item in a few days and the new one is fine!
customer_reviews.author: gaill

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Bed wouldn't fill up with air all the way. And you can't force it to pump anymore air in so you are stuck with what air is in there. Made for a very uncomfortable sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Johnathan Z.

customer_reviews.title: cold, not comfortable, hassle.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like it, air mattresses in general that is, even with blankets on top, you get cold from the mattress, only a thin layer of plastic and a sheet between you and cold air, forcing you to put my foam pad on top for warmth and comfort, or extra blankets under me as well as on top, which negates the whole purpose. Better off with a 4" or 6" Tri-Fold foam pad to sleep on, more stable, more comfortable, warmer, no hassle just unfold it, no electric power needed with foam tri-fold mattress, and no worries of leaks or punctures, and no noise.
customer_reviews.author: Pell

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had my history of a bad back and this has never made it hurt more than I would think an air mattress would! Very easy to assemble and take apart. Inflate it to your comfort and it’s very fast. The only downside is every couple of days I have to reinflate it a little bit. And the cool part is that it comes with stickers so that if there is a hole you can patch it! Also I ordered a twin size and they sent a queen which was unexpected but nice!
customer_reviews.author: Traci

customer_reviews.title: Customer service stepped up for a defective unit.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the height and size of the mattress and it is very comfortable. My issue was that after couple of uses indoor it started loosing air through no visible points. Very disappointing, otherwise 5-stars. I called CSvc and they sent me another unit, which I have used once and hope will last much longer.
customer_reviews.author: AJBR

customer_reviews.title: *!*!*!* DIDN'T LAST! **Update!**
customer_reviews.text: That's twice! The second one is flat. Doesn't hold air for two hours! Arrived on time. Took a three nights to acclimate myself to it. Started leaking about a week ago. Just broke! The pictures tell the story. A refund would be nice. VERY Good customer service. Within forty hours of company contact; "NEW" mattress arrived. AMAZING compared to most!
customer_reviews.author: Jason A.

customer_reviews.title: This company is fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this mattress in April 2020. It was everything I expected and very comfortable. In July of 2020 it developed a leak so I called the customer service number printed on the mattress. In 4 days I had a new mattress delivered to me. I was stunned! I expected a fight over the 2 year warranty, over shipping costs, - over something - but they did not. They honored the warranty in a swift and efficient manner and apologized for the inconvenience. They have created a loyal customer !
customer_reviews.author: Cruise Enthusiast

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed-- Broken/Punctured within few days of use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in June 2nd 2020, used it for only few days (~10days) and it got punctured by itself at one side of the mattress (Attached the pictures). Disappointed completely even though I bought it after reading many good reviews for this product. Never recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Suneeth

customer_reviews.title: Ripped 2nd night of use, can not be patched
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband to use after coming home from cancer treatments, he needed to be in a room by himself...and was hoping it would be a good product. The second night he used it he basically woke up on the floor . The seam ripped and it was no longer able to be used. Can not be patched as the hole was on a seam and the patch would not adhere. I compared this to many other inflatable beds before I purchased it and thought it would have been the best value. It should have definitely lasted more then one night.
customer_reviews.author: Robin MacDonald

customer_reviews.title: Easy, quick, durable, stays inflated. Awesome
customer_reviews.text: My daughter travelled for 75 days with this bed this summer with a drum Corp team. It was inflated, slept on, deflated and packed everyday. It stayed inflated, was comfortable and very easy to use. It is loud inflating as most but inflated so quick. Built in pump is so convenient and easy to use. She got one little pinhole puncture in it at one point. We found the hole, used repair patch and was good as new. Very satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: drock

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to tide me over during a cross-county move from CA to NY. When my movers were delayed, I needed it more than ever until my real bed arrived. This air mattress required me to inflate it least twice a night. Not fun for my new neighbors who had to listen to the noisy roar of the inflation. Not helpful to me or my back to wake up twice a night to do this. Spend a little more money and get a better air mattress is my advice.
customer_reviews.author: Julia A. Goodwin

customer_reviews.title: FIRM, PERFECT AIR MATTRESS
customer_reviews.text: This mattress blows up to be super hard and firm. The air releases just barely after one night's use. During the night, my partner and I (both around 160-170 pounds) moved around, and there was NO classic "seesaw" effect at all. We plan to sleep on this for the next 2 weeks and we are confident it will hold up. The inflation is easy, just turn the knob and press the 'on' button. Plus it contains a power cord compartment on the bottom end of mattress. 10/10 Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Hillary

customer_reviews.title: Easy instructions,  inflates itself
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a bed while moving. Its super comfortable and very easy to inflate. Highly recommend. We'll probably use this for guests that decide to stay over. Would definitely tell friends and family to buy.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: EZ Inflate Double High Air Bed
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this air bed to use on an unexpected vacation. It was very easy to set up, and just as easy to un-inflate to take down! It was very comfortable...we are 69 and 71 yrs old and found this air bed very comfortable to get a good nights sleep. We are used to a Sleep Number bed and this air bed was perfect for us! Would highly recommend this bed to anyone in need of extra sleeping area!
customer_reviews.author: Ann M Robson

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I only had this for about 1 month if that and my son was laying on it and it just popped. I would not recommend this mattress. Very upset that all I got was one months use. Now I find out I can’t return my merch and I’d have to pay for a new one? That’s ridiculous! I will never support that brand ever again, and Amazon, I’m VERY disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: Tara Gainey

customer_reviews.title: Premium Inflatable Mattress at a Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and easy to inflate and deflate. The bag included is large enough to easily bag the mattress for storage. I bought these for my neighbor who will be without mattresses for about 2 weeks while moving to another state. I like them so much I'm going to buy one and just tuck it away!
customer_reviews.author: S Guzman

customer_reviews.title: Horrible quality, do not buy unless you want to sleep on the ground!
customer_reviews.text: Bought first one and had a hole, bought a second one and after one night it’s on the ground. Quality is bad, and now I can’t return because it’s out if the return window! Do not buy, horrible quality!
customer_reviews.author: Love cashmere

customer_reviews.title: Superb!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had it long enough to give a five star but so far it's holding up well. Easy to inflate, and when you first unpackage it, inflate it and let it sit for a couple days to get the wrinkles out and it smells like PVC. Then test for firmness. You may need to add air again. But again so far it's doing better than any inflatable mattress I've owned. The price is right. Will update.
customer_reviews.author: Malama

customer_reviews.title: UPDATE
customer_reviews.text: I am updating my review because this seller really came through on the warranty. I didnt know Inwould get an entire new bed. It's better than the first and I live it. Thank you so much Patrick and team for living up to customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last
customer_reviews.text: Nearly had it 2 months and is already leaking. Was advertised as "puncture proof ". Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Nice & comfortable to sleep on.
customer_reviews.text: I bought for my son & daughter when they visit. He’s 7 years old. They both love it, they take turns sleeping on it, one in bed, & one on blow up bed. She says it’s nice, comfortable & sturdy. Easy to blow up, quickly. When they leave they pack it back in the container, from whence it came, out, it in the closet, easy to store away. They like it!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia M. Mitchell.

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: Was charged $12.62 for a box to return it. Terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Stevenson Haskell

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and outstanding customer service.
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely pleased with this mattress. It can be adjusted for firmness. I had a slow leak, so I called the 800 number. Without any question, they sent me a new one. I received in a week. Amazing considering what's going on in our country. Great quality and outstanding customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Tsk

customer_reviews.title: A Literal Let Down
customer_reviews.text: Needed this for when my disabled brother in law visits and now it won't hold air after using it twice. I keep having to get him up every hour or so to refill it. Have only had it just over a month. So not happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Schmitty

customer_reviews.title: Great way to add comfortable sleeping space
customer_reviews.text: This package arrived as scheduled and was as advertised. It did have a strong plastic smell that dissipated after 24 hours with air circulation in the room. Mattress quickly inflated. Have used it for only 2 nights and my guest said it is perfect. It is lightweight so you can shift it around easily. Some mentioned the dimples and that it was hot but we did not find those true in our case.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: I bought three of these and they have all worked beautifully. The ease of inflation and deflation makes them a pleasure to set up and pack away in the nicely sized storage bag. The height makes it easy to get out of the bed and they are very comfortable. Each has been used for only a few nights, I do suggest placing a blanket on the bed before installing the bottom sheet in cooler weather.
customer_reviews.author: Jim C.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and durable
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only had this blown up for one night, but it held up great to me and my three medium sized dogs. It does have a plastic smell like other reviews have said, but honestly, it’s not worse than any of the other name brand ones I’ve bought in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Appabot

customer_reviews.title: So so mattress
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this so I have no idea on its durability This mattress is not comfortable I have scoliosis and after lying on it 10 min my back hurt
customer_reviews.author: nurse lady

customer_reviews.title: Best air mattress we have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this product to use during our move. It is super easy to inflate and deflate. It is very firm for an air mattress. We left it inflated for over 12 hours and it was still full of air. We haven't used it yet but I will update this post once we move. Even though we haven't used it yet it is still by the best one we have ever bought.
customer_reviews.author: Bonita M.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: This matress is a great buy very sturdy easy to inflate and deflate and the only reason I gave it a 4 star on comfort is because it is an air mattress! But that being said it is very comfortable and well made. I was afraid that I would feel like I would roll off or something but not with this mattress
customer_reviews.author: Jake C

customer_reviews.title: Love Love
customer_reviews.text: I sleep on all kinds of air mattress at the beach. This one by far is the bomb. Easily inflates, no pump necessary, doesn't deflate during the night. Slept through the night it was so comfortable. I'm purchasing two more for guests. Made of very durable thick fabric. Purchased a twin and was worried I'd fall off but boy I was wrong. Lots of room.
customer_reviews.author: Favorites

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: This air mattress is one of the best buys that I have made through Amazon. We are moving out of state and have shipped all of our staff to the new location where will be arriving in two days. This air mattress was the most comfortable replacement of our queen size bed. We have been using it now for more than a week and we had no issues with deflating. No more back pain waking up in the morning. We love it as does our elderly dog who enjoys the ease of jumping on it and sleeping so restfully. We strongly recommend this great air mattress!
customer_reviews.author: Drcasoms

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for......
customer_reviews.text: Inflated the mattress two nights in a row, leaking on the second night, called the manufacturer's help number and it went to voice mail, went to their service website and does not exist.........I will try to work with it but probably will end up returning for a refund.......will update if things change.
customer_reviews.author: Mark McDonough

customer_reviews.title: Amazing mattress!
customer_reviews.text: Really great mattress, firm and comfortable. It is also super easy to inflate and deflate. One thing I noticed that helped is to inflate it, make the bed and then wait 30-40 minutes. After that give it one more shot of air to make sure it stays firm all night. Also important to note that you don’t have an insulation underneath you, so if you are sleeping in a chilly place (like I was) make sure you put a blanket or feather bed under your fitted sheet to keep you nice and warm.
customer_reviews.author: Patrice Z Ahlgren

customer_reviews.title: Great Temporary Bed
customer_reviews.text: Inflates and deflates quickly; seems quite durable; comfortable and easily adjustable to desired firmness; read and follow the instructions about inflating. Yes, after a couple days of use it needs a quick boost of air as instructed. Not a big deal - took less than 15 seeconds.
customer_reviews.author: retired gardener

customer_reviews.title: Loses air after a night’s sleep.
customer_reviews.text: Mattress loses air over a few days, fine for one night. Super easy to inflate.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress great value
customer_reviews.text: I really haven’t used this yet! I did inflate it initially to test it and it held air fine! Have never slept on it yet but I have a feeling it’s going to be just fine for comfort! Once I use this for overnight guest I’ll write another review! The value is great having the built in pump! One thing Is, if we lose power and happen to need the mattress, there is no way to pump the mattress with another device!
customer_reviews.author: Marci

customer_reviews.title: It leaks!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this mattress in advance of a trip, so did not use until after return window. If we had used it before that, it would have been returned. Thought this would be different than the typical cheap version, but was wrong. Does not stay firm through the night.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Mattress deflated halfway thru the night, uncomfortable to sleep on. DO NOT RECOMMEND. Returned back to amazon and only received 80% of refund. Extremely dissatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seller steps up!!!  Was: AVOID. AVOID. AVOID
customer_reviews.text: SELLER IS REPLACING AT NO COST !!!!! AWESOME!!!! (Was: AVOID. AVOID. AVOID. Pump broke after only 3 weeks. Can't be returned. AVOID. AVOID. AVOID.)
customer_reviews.author: Kevin W. Cannon

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable & easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Got it for our son when we visited. Comfortable fir me & I have a muscle disease & arthritis. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Sholly

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I’m very impressed with the quality of this bed. It’s easily held two adults the entire night comfortably. It does lose a little air when you add the body weight, but not much. In other beds I’d end up sinking to the middle this one held its own and didn’t have that issue at all. I’d definitely order again.
customer_reviews.author: Iheff

customer_reviews.title: It did deflate a tad but held up just fine & niece said she had a comfortable sleep on it.
customer_reviews.text: The look of it is nice -- very elegant. Seller should disclose bed height but bought queen deep sheets that fit decently. Instructions could be better but we figured it out once we located the plug by opening the lid of a box at the end of bed. It's a keeper.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to inflate and deflate
customer_reviews.text: I got 2 twin size .. they were very easy to inflate.. used them for 7-weeks every night .. had to add a little air for my 4-yr old grandson once and about once a week for the adult bed.. I would highly recommend them for overflow company as was used in our case ..
customer_reviews.author: SH

customer_reviews.title: Great air mattress
customer_reviews.text: Best air mattress I’ve ever laid down on. Super easy to inflate and deflate. Very comfortable for an air mattress. Stands up to multiple nights of use without needing to be reinflated. As other reviews mentioned it does not have a way to inflate manually so you have to have access to power to use it. And I don’t think I’ll ever get it to fit back into the bag it came in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: We bought it to use when we visited our daughter. We were shocked with how easy it was to inflate and how comfortable it was. We’ve used it several times. It was a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Mattress wouldn't hold air through the night
customer_reviews.text: Item is easy to inflate and comfortable once inflated to the softness you want. However, for the three nights we used it it lost half the air we put into it. Couldn't find the location of the leak. We returned it with hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald E. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality!
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is exactly what we were hoping for! It’s very good quality, durable and very comfortable. It took less than 2 min to inflate, and it was so easy to figure out how to do it! I will recommend this product 100 times over. My son has been sleeping on it for the last 8 nights and so far it hasn’t needed to be re-inflated yet.
customer_reviews.author: Krissy Gannon

customer_reviews.title: Serves its purpose.
customer_reviews.text: Nice mattress. Does not have a place for pump inflation only plug in. And make sure to read the way the valves are supposed to be opened prior to inflation or it doesnt inflate and gets hot and you have to leave it sit to cool off. Serves the purpose it was meant for.
customer_reviews.author: Jaymi

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and durable!
customer_reviews.text: I slept on this air mattress for a week while I was waiting for my actual bed to arrive. It was comfortable, didn't deflate in the night, and is a really good size when inflated. Easy to inflate, easy to store. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Loses air through the night
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bed a little over a month ago and used it 3 times. By the 3rd use it deflated through the night and lost over half the air and I would have to wake up and pump it up. Was great the first couple times and now I am a week late to be able to return it. Reading other reviews it sounds like mine must be a lemon and it was great the first couple of uses.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: HAPPY FACE
customer_reviews.text: Nothing is for sure on any of these beds but I do recommend this is anything any holes this company is extremely fast in responding to you with no issues and replacing according to the 2 year warranty it's certainly worth it
customer_reviews.author: breezy

customer_reviews.title: WAS HOPEFUL BUT DISAPPOINTED
customer_reviews.text: We followed all instructions BEFORE FIRST USE! Have used it 2x and each time it deflates a little bit more.EXTREMELY DISAPPOINTED! When inflated and you get into bed, it is very comfortable but 6 hours later you notice how much air is gone.
customer_reviews.author: MBS

customer_reviews.title: Great reviews and I agree.
customer_reviews.text: Slept on it several nights and slept great. Only had to add air after the first night which was expected since you knew it had to stretch a little.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: They don't last long
customer_reviews.text: None of these beds if your going to use the 7 nights a week . Give it two months and your going to have a problem. I bought a regular mattress now because this was 2nd one . Not the same one. I had it though with air beds. Nothing but a pain in the neck
customer_reviews.author: Steven Dwyer

customer_reviews.title: Leaked on 3rd use
customer_reviews.text: Really comfortable and blows up fast. Even though I followed instructions to let it stretch out first, I had to top it off before each use just a little. The twisted caps pop open if not screwed closed just right. Its a great unit, except the 3rd time I used it for camping there was a slow leak and I needed to blow it up in the middle of the night. For a 2 year warranty, I expected it to last more than 4 weeks. I plan to return it and hopefully they honor the warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Strong

customer_reviews.title: Test before you use on a camping trip
customer_reviews.text: I would give this product 5 stars because when we inflated them at home they were great. But when we got to our campsite and tried to inflate, they didnt work. He has a 120V in his truck, but the power wasnt strong enough, so we were left to sleep on the ground our whole trip. We just assumed all 120V outlets were the same amount of power. These should have a manual inflate option as well. Oops. Lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi

customer_reviews.title: Super soft air mattress with built in plug
customer_reviews.text: I like how super soft it is when I lay down on it. It feels way better than my old air bed. It's better quality. It's expensive but I Iike that it has a built in plug inside. It definitely feels very luxurious
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: All you need
customer_reviews.text: Great air mattress. Easy to inflate and deflate. Like that it comes with patches and a bag for storage.
customer_reviews.author: pablo

customer_reviews.title: will not hold air
customer_reviews.text: I read many of the reviews prior to my purchase but this blow up mattress seemed to be the perfect solution fot my needs. We recently began having my grandson for sleepovers who is only 3 1/2 years old. The mattress would not stay inflated throughout the night. I gave it several attempts figuring that there was a "break in" period but eneded up with the same result every time. It's really a shame because I really liked the mattress and it blows up very quickly but if it won't hold air throughout even 1 night, it defeats the purpose . Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Thomas J Levins

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and very durable
customer_reviews.text: This is the easiest inflatable I have ever used! No extra tools needed. You literally plug it in and open/close the valves to inflate/deflate and you are set! Has been durable after 2 months of use by an 8 and 11 year old (who has to tackle/wrestle EVERYWHERE!)
customer_reviews.author: L. Ward

customer_reviews.title: Deflated quickly
customer_reviews.text: This item was great for the first two weeks....then it started deflating rapidly. A few mornings i woke up on the floor. Horrible item quality poor. Finally threw it out bought another.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: Tore a leak very quickly - surprising
customer_reviews.text: What can I say? I tore a leak and it is a very recent purchase and just outside of the return window. I may bring this up with amazon directly but not sure if its worth it. I hope others just read this and run from this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Odel

customer_reviews.title: Too low
customer_reviews.text: It is very comfortable but is very low. I bought it because my home and all contents burned to the ground, and insurance had not kicked in. As long as you keep it inflated it is okay.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy Peasy.
customer_reviews.text: Used this when we were moving &our furniture hadn’t been delivered yet. Bed was easy to inflate &deflate And quite comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: CG

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in "used" Condition
customer_reviews.text: Although I'm planning to keep this product, I am 100% certain that someone else used it and returned it. It was quite dirty and required some serious handheld vacuuming to clean to flocked top. It was drawn on with a marker and had pink fingernail polish spilled on the flocked part. Since they sell these NEW and USED on Amazon, I wish I'd just paid the used price, since that's clearly what I received.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew B. Dublin

customer_reviews.title: High quality, reliable self inflating mattress
customer_reviews.text: I have used this mattress for camping trips off and on for several months and it still holds up just fine. It inflates quickly, doesn’t leak much if at all overnight, and appears very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Clark

customer_reviews.title: Great Airbed and Amazing Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: The airbed is very comfortable and it inflates easily. However, after a month of use, the shape has changed. At first I wrote a bad review at which point the manufacturer contacted me and sent me a replacement. I am now very happy with the product and with the customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Sasa Z

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding inflatable mattress; easy to inflate & deflate-grandkids thought those processes were fun/exciting!! Mattresses maintained their air for the 2 nites we used them; very nice-looking & comfortable; great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Banks

customer_reviews.title: Power inflate and deflate.
customer_reviews.text: I do not regret buying this at all. We use it for the kids friends when they have a sleepover. Inflates in a few seconds, and has the power deflate in just a few seconds as well. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it. Poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered many inflatable beds in the recent past from a variety of name brands. This is the first time a bed has malfunctioned in such a short time. It was used daily for about three weeks when a leak has made the bed unusable. This usually happens to inflatable beds at some point after an extended period of use spanning several months to a year, but this bed could not withstand even a short period of use.
customer_reviews.author: dlester

customer_reviews.title: Customer service was as impressive as the mattress.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased one of these and have been extremely happy. For the price, the quality, built in pump, and comfort, made it great. Had a leak occur in one and the customer service was even great. Quickly handled the issue and sent us a replacement with no hassle at all.
customer_reviews.author: Cleve

product_meta.title: EZ INFLATE Double High Luxury Twin Air Mattress with Built in Pump, Inflatable Mattress, Twin airbed with Flocked top, All Purpose Twin Blow up Bed, Home Camping Travel with a 2 Year Warranty
product_meta.description: Size:TwinEZ INFLATE Double High Luxury Twin Air Mattress with Built in Pump, Inflatable Mattress, Twin airbed with Flocked top, All Purpose Twin Blow up Bed, Home Camping Travel with a 2 Year Warranty
feature_bullets: 2 YEAR MANUFACTURER WARRANTY - GREAT SLEEP SHOULDN’T BREAK THE BANK – the EZ INFLATE air mattress provides a comfortable night of sleep at an affordable price. This blow up mattress twin size can hold up to 300 lbs., and is constructed from durable, puncture resistant PVC.

WE DON’T SKIMP ON SPACE - EZ INFLATE air mattress twin size beds are designed to maximize sleep space. Measurements are edge to edge on the soft flocked top, and not to the rounded edges of the air mattress. This means you end up with more space to sleep on. Our airbed twin size measures a full 76” x 38” surface. Inside, coil beam technology provides the perfect level of stability and support for a great night's sleep.

ADAPTIVE SUPPORT FOR DIFFERENT SLEEP STYLES –EZ INFLATE’s airbed boasts the ability to customize your inflatable mattress to your desired level of air. A turn of the simple inflate/deflate valve will help you maximize your comfort level by adding or removing air. For use with or without bed sheets, the waterproof top and sides are easy to care for.

BACKED BY INCREDIBLE CUSTOMER SERVICE & 2-YEAR WARRANTY – We hope you never need us, but if you do, EZ INFLATE airbed customer service is here to help you out. Your blow up bed comes with the assurance of knowing you can pick up the phone anytime you have a question!

30-DAY MONEY BACK GUARANTEE ALONG WITH TIPS FOR BEST USE - The EZ INFLATE twin air mattress with built in pump not only inflates in JUST 90 SECONDS, it holds its inflation! We recommend inflating for the first time 24 hours before use to allow the PVC to properly stretch. Then, if necessary, top off the inflatable mattress with a few seconds of air.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars701 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
